data.title: Blue Ridge Christian School
data.meta_description: Find Blue Ridge Christian School's current tuition rates, fees, discounts, financial aid information and more.
data.text:
Lump Sum: Pay the annual tuition in one payment. Payments are due by August 10th. This payment can be made through your account on Blackbaud or by mailing or dropping off a check to the school. Our mailing address is PO Box 207 Bridgewater, VA 22812.

Installments: Pay the tuition in 12 monthly installments (July-June). Payments can be made once a month or twice a month if you would like them to line up with your paychecks. To set up monthly payments please complete the EFT form to have the payment drafted from your account on a set date. If you have questions about a specific installment plan please reach out to Amy Good, Director of Finance, at 540.828.2233 or agood@brcschool.org.

We offer financial aid for students in Kindergarten through 12th grade based on the determined financial need. We use a third party company, ISM FAST, to calculate that need. Financial aid awards can be up to 40% of the tuition amount. Financial Aid Application

How much does tuition assistance reduce the annual tuition cost per student?

$1,800-$5,200, depending on each familyâ€™s unique grade and financial situation.

This program provides state tax credits for donations made to Approved Scholarship Foundations that provide scholarships to eligible students and attending participating private schools.

Scholarships are available for students whose family income does not exceed 300% of federal poverty guidelines. Family income for students with disabilities with an individualized education program may not exceed 400% of federal poverty guidelines. Eligible students must be entering kindergarten, first grade, or coming to BRCS from public school. To determine eligibility please look at line #11 on your federal tax return. To be considered for this scholarship you need to complete the ISM FAST application.
